complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Anonymous to Member Data Migration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the anonymous to member data migration task into detailed subtasks covering the data migration strategy, conflict detection, preview functionality, conflict resolution, backup/restore mechanisms, testing, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex data operations with conflict resolution, preview functionality, and backup/restore mechanisms. The code sample shows multiple async operations and error handling. The task requires careful planning for data integrity and user experience.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Frontend for Dynamic Astrology Progressions

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating interactive UI components with animations and transitions. The Vue component structure shows moderate complexity with timeline controls, transitions, and dynamic data display. It requires frontend expertise but has well-defined requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the multi-astrology system integration task into detailed subtasks covering data structure design, system mapping, correlation algorithms, confidence scoring, layered display logic, API endpoints, performance optimization, and cross-system validation testing.
